text:
For the moment, dataset files are downloaded directly in the target directory. In case of error, the whole dataset is deleted to avoid junk files. This is a problem in the case of partial download of a dataset: previously downloaded data is erased.

The cleanest solution is to create a sandbox subdirectory and download everything in it. If download is successfull, files are then moved in their final location.
title: [ENH] Dataset fetcher: download in sandbox
